xml.data:
Home » 39P5 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5) » 2 Tika, Kusalattika » 2.20 Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Kusalattika » 2.20.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Tika, Kusalattika
Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Kusalattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
45.
435Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
436Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
437Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
